quote.quotepara: Or even better to start using shortcuts like CtrlZ or CtrlY

body.para: Yes, they came up when I selected standart toolbars . .CntlZ or CntrlY takes more time, because I h then have to go from mouse to keyboard and back. Not really a shortcut.
